p: After normalization, cDNA was fragmented to 500- to 800-bp fragments by sonication or nebulization and size-selected to remove small fragments using AMPure SPRI beads. The fragmented ends were polished and ligated with adaptors ( Meyer et al. 2009 ). The optimal ligation products were selectively amplified and subjected to two rounds of size selection including gel electrophoresis and AMPure SPRI bead purification ( Lai et al. 2012 ).
